title: Honor Capsule Reward Missing
body: Hello, today I logged in and noticed that I got a honor capsule. I opened it and got Medieval Twitch, a skin that I wanted for a long time. I also had 2 keys so I went to buy 2 crates from the shop and I opened them. Now the Twitch skin is missing from my Loot menu!! I still have my 2 other rewards.

replies.body: That Twitch skin from the capsule would have been permanent! You don't need to actually use essence to redeem them, so check your collection for that skin!
